abstract: The network equipment maker reported that its quarterly net income grew 7.2 percent amid growing concern that economic weakness could affect technology spending.
snippet: The network equipment maker reported that its quarterly net income grew 7.2 percent amid growing concern that economic weakness could affect technology spending.
lead_paragraph: Cisco Systems, the largest maker of network equipment, edged past Wall Street’s second-quarter sales targets but forecast a slowdown in orders for the third quarter as European and American customers pull back on technology spending.

headline.main: Despite Rise in Profit, Cisco Eases Its Forecast
headline.print_headline: Despite Rise In Profit, Cisco Eases Its Forecast
